name: Red Bulb Media
overview:
Red Bulb Media is an emerging leader in the full service performance based online industry, providing our clients with profit inducing web services, lead generation, and traditional advertising. Our list of services extends to advertisers and publishers in addition to our other clients who we create and execute results generating online pay-for-performance acquisition programs. We create results for our advertisers and a highly profitable revenue stream for our Publishers, through an easy-to-manage back end.

Our clients receive specialized online marketing through our team with years of experience. We take pride in our mission to work with our client’s acceptable cost of acquisition for new customers. We consider our clients true business partners.

Red Bulb Media consists of individuals who’ve achieved success, awards and accolades that place them at the top of their industries. We’ve worked with Fortune 1000 companies as affiliate program managers, direct response marketers, creative directors, corporate marketing managers, internet marketers, media buyers, advertising agency executives, search engine marketers, affiliate marketers, web designers, and programmers.
